lead_paragraph: A Syrian amputee swimmer, granted asylum in Greece, will be a torch-bearer for the 2016 Rio Games and is to run with the Olympic flame through a refugee camp in Athens on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Refugee Amputee Swimmer a Torch-Bearer for Rio Games
headline.main: Refugee Amputee Swimmer a Torch-Bearer for Rio Games

snippet: A Syrian amputee swimmer, granted asylum in Greece, will be a torch-bearer for the 2016 Rio Games and is to run with the Olympic flame through a refugee camp in Athens on Tuesday....
